body_html:
Yes, 2 space indent is a bit of an accident, but here we are, and changing it is not a priority (and would invalidate 100% of our git blame, which is too valuable to lose).

I would also prefer an annotation for each file, but I don't believe that linter tools will respect vim comments, and vim will likely not respect pylint directives (which we'd be more likely to use).
